title: US Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs face $1 billion outflow amid market dip
summary: Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the United States recorded nearly $1 billion in combined outflows on Aug. 19, extending a current streak of investor withdrawals. These heavy outflows can be linked to the recent price corrections in the crypto market. According to CryptoSlate’s data, Bitcoin price retraced from recent highs to as […] The post US Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs face $1 billion outflow amid market dip appeared first on CryptoSlate .

title: Wall Street Groups Urge Basel to Rethink ‘Outdated’ 1,250% Crypto Capital Rules
summary: Major Wall Street trade associations including Global Financial Markets Association formally urge Basel Committee to pause implementation of 1,250% crypto capital requirements, arguing the 2022 framework has become outdated due to rapid DLT developments and explosion of regulated digital asset markets.
